name: Faux Suede Jacket With Roll-up Sleeves

attributes.care_label: Do not dry clean hand wash up to 30ºc/86ºf do not bleach do not iron do not tumble dry.

short_description:
Pull&Bear is a young fashion brand created in 1991 in Spain as part of the Inditex group. It is present in 74 markets and has approximately one thousand stores worldwide. Find the key garments for autumn-winter 2023 at P&B and revamp your wardrobe. Opt for cargo trousers, joggers, jeans, overshirts or padded jackets. You can also go for a more urban style with our collection of licensed T-shirts and sweatshirts. Discover the must-have and most up-to date garments to create your winter looks.

Model: 175 cm tall and size S.

Long faux suede jacket with roll-up sleeves, a lapel collar and front pockets.

short_description:
PLEASE NOTE - THE ICONIC IS UNABLE TO SHIP THIS PRODUCT TO NEW ZEALAND

Founded by two hiking enthusiasts in the heart of San Francisco, The North Face delivers an extensive line of performance apparel, equipment and footwear. With the most technically advanced products on the market, the brand is a favourite of the world's most accomplished climbers, mountaineers, extreme skiers, snowboarders and explorers. The North Face is committed to pushing the limits of design, so that you can push your limits outdoors.

Length: 60cm (size small). Our model is 172.7cm (5’8”) tall with a 81.3cm (32”) bust, a 63.5cm (25”) waist and 92.7cm (36.5”) hips.

- Lightweight fabrication; lined; opaque
- Stand-up collar
- Long sleeves
- Full zip front
- Side zip pockets

name: Essential Repel Woven Jacket

attributes.care_label: Cold machine wash. Tumble dry. Cool iron.

short_description:
In their pursuit for optimum human performance, Nike has exceeded its status as America’s sportswear giant and has cemented itself as a global repository of innovation, insight and potential. From tees, tanks and tights to sports bras, tracksuits and jackets, each Swoosh-stamped piece has been designed and structured with biomechanically-tested technology proven to control body temperature and enhance aerodynamic motion. Acclaimed for the introduction of Aeroloft insulation, moisture-wicking Dri-FIT, wind-resistant Clima-Fit and AeroReact thermoregulation, the ‘Just Do It’ brand has revolutionised the road to athletic success. By customising their apparel to suit different sports and their climates, the inimitable Nike continues to inspire and drive the elite athlete in us all.

Length: 71cm (size small). Our model is 175.3cm (5’9”) tall with a 81.3cm (32”) bust, a 68.6cm (27”) waist and 91.4cm (36”) hips.

- Soft, water-repellent woven fabric; non-stretch
- Fixed hoodie; adjustable draw-cords
- Signature logo embroidery to front
- Zip-up front closure
- Vents to front and back
- Twin front pockets
